text: The Isle of Portland is an island in Dorset in the south of England. Portland is south of the resort of Weymouth. 13,000 people live there. It is where the famous Portland limestone was originally found.West, Ian 2012. Ian West's website on the Jurassic Coast and more. Includes the Isle of Portland and its surrounds. Soton.ac.uk In 2012, the sailing in the Olympics took place on Portland and in Weymouth. == References == == Other websites == Category:Geography of Dorset Category:Islands of England
title: Isle of Portland
